  47
  48inline 
  49void
  50split_tuple(
  51  index_type        value,
  52  dimension_type    dim,
  53  index_type const* size,
  54  index_type*       pos)
  55{
  56  index_type orig = value;
  57
  58  (void)orig;
  59
  60  // We default to row-major because that is the natural way in C/C++.
  61#if 0
  62  // Column-major mapping of processors to subblocks.
  63  for (dimension_type i=0; i<dim; ++i)
  64  {
  65    pos[i] = value % size[i];
  66    value  = (value - pos[i]) / size[i];
  67  }
  68
  69  assert(
  70    (dim == 1 && pos[0]  == orig) ||
  71    (dim == 2 && pos[0] + pos[1]*size[0] == orig) ||
  72    (dim == 3 && pos[0] + pos[1]*size[0] + pos[2]*size[0]*size[1] == orig));
  73#else
  74  // Row-major mapping of processors to subblocks.
  75  for (dimension_type i=dim; i-->0; )
  76  {
  77    pos[i] = value % size[i];
  78    value  = (value - pos[i]) / size[i];
  79  }
  80
  81  assert(
  82    (dim == 1 && pos[0]  == orig) ||
  83    (dim == 2 && pos[0]*size[1] + pos[1] == orig) ||
  84    (dim == 3 && pos[0]*size[1]*size[2] + pos[1]*size[2] + pos[2] == orig));
  85#endif
  86}
  87
  88} // namespace impl
  89

  92// Forward declaration.
  93template <typename Dist0,
  94	  typename Dist1,
  95	  typename Dist2>
  96bool
  97operator==(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map1,
  98	   Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map2) VSIP_NOTHROW;
  99
 100// Forward declaration.
 101template <dimension_type Dim,
 102	  typename       Dist0,
 103	  typename       Dist1,
 104	  typename       Dist2>
 105bool
 106map_equiv(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map1,
 107	  Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map2) VSIP_NOTHROW;

 109
 110
 111template <typename Dist0,
 112	  typename Dist1,
 113	  typename Dist2>
 114struct Map_data
 115  : public impl::Ref_count<Map_data<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >,
 116    impl::Non_copyable
 117{
 118  typedef std::vector<processor_type>      impl_pvec_type;
 119
 120  // Constructors.
 121public:
 122  Map_data(
 123    Dist0 const&            dist0,
 124    Dist1 const&            dist1,
 125    Dist2 const&            dist2)
 126  VSIP_NOTHROW
 127  : dist0_ (dist0),
 128    dist1_ (dist1),
 129    dist2_ (dist2),
 130    comm_  (impl::default_communicator()),
 131    pvec_  (),
 132    num_subblocks_(dist0.num_subblocks() *
 133		   dist1.num_subblocks() *
 134		   dist2.num_subblocks()),
 135    num_procs_ (num_subblocks_)
 136  {
 137    assert(num_subblocks_ <= comm_.pvec().size());
 138
 139    for (index_type i=0; i<num_subblocks_; ++i)
 140      pvec_.push_back(comm_.pvec()[i]);
 141
 142    subblocks_[0] = dist0_.num_subblocks();
 143    subblocks_[1] = dist1_.num_subblocks();
 144    subblocks_[2] = dist2_.num_subblocks();
 145
 146    // It is necessary that the number of subblocks be less than the
 147    // number of processors.
 148    assert(num_subblocks_ <= num_procs_);
 149  }
 150
 151  template <typename BlockT>
 152  Map_data(
 153    const_Vector<processor_type, BlockT> pvec,
 154    Dist0 const&                         dist0,
 155    Dist1 const&                         dist1,
 156    Dist2 const&                         dist2)
 157  VSIP_NOTHROW
 158  : dist0_ (dist0),
 159    dist1_ (dist1),
 160    dist2_ (dist2),
 161    comm_  (impl::default_communicator()),
 162    pvec_  (),
 163    num_subblocks_(dist0.num_subblocks() *
 164		   dist1.num_subblocks() *
 165		   dist2.num_subblocks()),
 166    num_procs_ (num_subblocks_)
 167  {
 168    assert(num_subblocks_ <= pvec.size());
 169
 170    for (index_type i=0; i<num_subblocks_; ++i)
 171      pvec_.push_back(pvec.get(i));
 172
 173    subblocks_[0] = dist0_.num_subblocks();
 174    subblocks_[1] = dist1_.num_subblocks();
 175    subblocks_[2] = dist2_.num_subblocks();
 176  }
 177
 178   ~Map_data()
 179  {
 180  }
 181
 182  // Member data.
 183public:
 184  Dist0               dist0_;
 185  Dist1               dist1_;
 186  Dist2               dist2_;
 187
 188  impl::Communicator& comm_;
 189  impl_pvec_type      pvec_;		  // Grid function.
 190
 191  length_type	      num_subblocks_;	  // Total number of subblocks.
 192  length_type	      num_procs_;	  // Total number of processors.
 193
 194  index_type	      subblocks_[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
 195					  // Number of subblocks in each
 196					  // dimension.
 197};
 198
 199
 200
 201// Map class.
 202
 203template <typename Dist0,
 204	  typename Dist1,
 205	  typename Dist2>
 206class Map
 207{
 208  // Compile-time typedefs.
 209public:
 210  typedef impl::Value_iterator<processor_type, unsigned> processor_iterator;
 211
 212  typedef typename Map_data<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_pvec_type
 213    impl_pvec_type;
 214
 215  static bool const impl_local_only  = false;
 216  static bool const impl_global_only = true;
 217
 218  // Constructors and destructor.
 219public:
 220  Map(Dist0 const& = Dist0(), Dist1 const& = Dist1(), Dist2 const& = Dist2())
 221    VSIP_NOTHROW;
 222
 223  template <typename BlockT>
 224  Map(const_Vector<processor_type, BlockT>,
 225      Dist0 const& = Dist0(),
 226      Dist1 const& = Dist1(),
 227      Dist2 const& = Dist2())
 228    VSIP_NOTHROW;
 229
 230  Map(Map const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 231
 232  Map& operator=(Map const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 233
 234  ~Map() VSIP_NOTHROW
 235  {
 236    if (this->impl_is_applied())
 237      impl::destroy_ll_pset(applied_pset_);
 238  }
 239
 240
 241  // Accessors.
 242public:
 243  // Information on individual distributions.
 244  distribution_type distribution     (dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 245  length_type       num_subblocks    (dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 246  length_type       cyclic_contiguity(dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 247
 248  length_type num_subblocks()  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 249  { return data_->num_subblocks_; }
 250
 251  length_type num_processors() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 252  { return data_->num_procs_; }
 253
 254  index_type subblock(processor_type pr) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 255  index_type subblock() const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 256
 257  processor_iterator processor_begin(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 258  processor_iterator processor_end  (index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 259
 260  const_Vector<processor_type> processor_set() const;
 261
 262
 263  // Applied map functions.
 264  length_type impl_num_patches     (index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 265
 266  template <dimension_type Dim>
 267  void impl_apply(Domain<Dim> const& dom) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 268
 269  template <dimension_type Dim>
 270  Domain<Dim> impl_subblock_domain(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 271
 272  template <dimension_type Dim>
 273  impl::Length<Dim> impl_subblock_extent(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 274
 275  template <dimension_type Dim>
 276  Domain<Dim> impl_global_domain(index_type sb, index_type patch)
 277    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 278
 279  template <dimension_type Dim>
 280  Domain<Dim> impl_local_domain (index_type sb, index_type patch)
 281    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 282
 283  template <dimension_type Dim>
 284  Domain<Dim> applied_domain () const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 285
 286  // Implementation functions.
 287  impl::par_ll_pset_type impl_ll_pset() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 288    { assert(this->impl_is_applied()); return applied_pset_; }
 289  impl_pvec_type const& impl_pvec() const { return data_->pvec_; }
 290  impl::Communicator&   impl_comm() const { return data_->comm_; }
 291  bool                  impl_is_applied() const { return dim_ != 0; }
 292
 293  length_type         impl_working_size() const
 294    { return std::min(this->num_subblocks(), this->data_->pvec_.size()); }
 295
 296
 297  // Implementation functions.
 298public:
 299  length_type impl_subblock_patches(dimension_type d, index_type sb)
 300    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 301  length_type impl_subblock_size(dimension_type d, index_type sb)
 302    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 303  Domain<1> impl_patch_global_dom(dimension_type d, index_type sb,
 304				  index_type p)
 305    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 306  Domain<1> impl_patch_local_dom(dimension_type d, index_type sb,
 307				 index_type p)
 308    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 309
 310  index_type impl_dim_subblock_from_index(dimension_type d, index_type idx)
 311    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 312  index_type impl_dim_patch_from_index(dimension_type d, index_type idx)
 313    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 314  index_type impl_local_from_global_index(dimension_type d, index_type idx)
 315    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 316
 317  template <dimension_type Dim>
 318  index_type impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<Dim> const& idx)
 319    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 320
 321  template <dimension_type Dim>
 322  index_type impl_patch_from_global_index(Index<Dim> const& idx)
 323    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 324
 325  index_type impl_global_from_local_index(dimension_type d, index_type sb,
 326					  index_type idx)
 327    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 328
 329  template <dimension_type Dim>
 330  Domain<Dim> impl_local_from_global_domain(index_type sb,
 331					    Domain<Dim> const& dom)
 332    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 333
 334  // Implementation compile-time types, and friends.
 335public:
 336  typedef Dist0 impl_dim0_type;
 337  typedef Dist1 impl_dim1_type;
 338  typedef Dist2 impl_dim2_type;
 339
 340  friend bool operator==<>(Map const&, Map const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 341  friend bool map_equiv<1>(Map const&, Map const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 342  friend bool map_equiv<2>(Map const&, Map const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 343  friend bool map_equiv<3>(Map const&, Map const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 344  friend struct impl::Map_equal<1, Map, Map>;
 345  friend struct impl::Map_equal<2, Map, Map>;
 346  friend struct impl::Map_equal<3, Map, Map>;
 347
 348public:
 349  index_type     impl_rank_from_proc(processor_type pr) const;
 350  processor_type impl_proc_from_rank(index_type idx) const
 351    { return data_->pvec_[idx]; }
 352
 353  // Members.
 354private:
 355  impl::Ref_counted_ptr<Map_data<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> > data_;
 356
 357  Domain<3>	         dom_;		  // Applied domain.
 358  dimension_type         dim_;		  // Dimension of applied domain.
 359  impl::par_ll_pset_type applied_pset_;
 360};
 361
 362

 364/***********************************************************************
 365  Definitions
 366***********************************************************************/
 367
 368template <typename       Dist0,
 369	  typename       Dist1,
 370	  typename       Dist2>
 371inline
 372Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::Map(
 373  Dist0 const&            dist0,
 374  Dist1 const&            dist1,
 375  Dist2 const&            dist2)
 376VSIP_NOTHROW
 377: data_      (new Map_data<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>(dist0, dist1, dist2),
 378	      impl::noincrement),
 379  dim_       (0)
 380{
 381  // It is necessary that the number of subblocks be less than the
 382  // number of processors.
 383  assert(data_->num_subblocks_ <= data_->num_procs_);
 384}
 385
 386
 387
 388template <typename Dist0,
 389	  typename Dist1,
 390	  typename Dist2>
 391template <typename BlockT>
 392inline
 393Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::Map(
 394  const_Vector<processor_type, BlockT> pvec,
 395  Dist0 const&                         dist0,
 396  Dist1 const&                         dist1,
 397  Dist2 const&                         dist2)
 398VSIP_NOTHROW
 399: data_     (new Map_data<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>(pvec, dist0, dist1, dist2),
 400	     impl::noincrement),
 401  dim_      (0)
 402{
 403  // It is necessary that the number of subblocks be less than the
 404  // number of processors.
 405  assert(data_->num_subblocks_ <= data_->num_procs_);
 406}

 409
 410template <typename       Dist0,
 411	  typename       Dist1,
 412	  typename       Dist2>
 413inline
 414Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::Map(Map const& rhs) VSIP_NOTHROW
 415: data_      (rhs.data_),
 416  dom_       (rhs.dom_),
 417  dim_       (0)
 418{
 419}
 420
 421
 422
 423template <typename       Dist0,
 424	  typename       Dist1,
 425	  typename       Dist2>
 426inline Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>&
 427Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::operator=(Map const& rhs) VSIP_NOTHROW
 428{
 429  data_ = rhs.data_;
 430
 431  dom_  = rhs.dom_;
 432  dim_  = 0;
 433
 434  return *this;
 435}
 436
 437
 438
 439// Apply a map to a domain.
 440
 441// Notes:
 442// [1] Do not allow maps to partition dimensions beyond the applied domain.
 443//     This creates empty subblocks outside of the map's dimension,
 444//     which confuses the routines which convert a map subblock index
 445//     into individual dimension subblock indices (split_tuple).
 446
 447template <typename       Dist0,
 448	  typename       Dist1,
 449	  typename       Dist2>
 450template <dimension_type Dim>
 451inline void
 452Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_apply(Domain<Dim> const& dom)
 453  VSIP_NOTHROW
 454{
 455  Domain<1> arr[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
 456
 457  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
 458    arr[d] = dom[d];
 459  for (dimension_type d=Dim; d<VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION; ++d)
 460  {
 461    arr[d] = Domain<1>(1);
 462    assert(this->num_subblocks(d) == 1); // note [1]
 463  }
 464
 465  dim_ = Dim;
 466  dom_ = impl::construct_domain<VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION>(arr);
 467
 468  impl_pvec_type const& pvec = this->impl_pvec();
 469  if (VSIP_IMPL_USE_PAS_SEGMENT_SIZE)
 470  {
 471    // Create the applied pset, which excludes processors with empty subblocks.
 472    impl_pvec_type real_pvec;
 473    real_pvec.reserve(pvec.size() + 1);
 474
 475    for (index_type i=0; i<pvec.size(); ++i)
 476    {
 477      processor_type pr = pvec[i];
 478      index_type     sb = this->subblock(pr);
 479      if (this->template impl_subblock_domain<Dim>(sb).size() > 0)
 480	real_pvec.push_back(pr);
 481    }
 482
 483    impl::create_ll_pset(real_pvec, applied_pset_);
 484  }
 485  else
 486    impl::create_ll_pset(pvec, applied_pset_);
 487}
 488
 489
 490
 491template <typename       Dist0,
 492	  typename       Dist1,
 493	  typename       Dist2>
 494inline distribution_type
 495Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::distribution(dimension_type d)
 496  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 497{
 498  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 499
 500  switch (d)
 501  {
 502  default: assert(false);
 503  case 0: return data_->dist0_.distribution();
 504  case 1: return data_->dist1_.distribution();
 505  case 2: return data_->dist2_.distribution();
 506  }
 507}

 511template <typename       Dist0,
 512	  typename       Dist1,
 513	  typename       Dist2>
 514inline length_type
 515Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::num_subblocks(dimension_type d)
 516  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 517{
 518  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 519
 520  switch (d)
 521  {
 522  default: assert(false);
 523  case 0: return data_->dist0_.num_subblocks();
 524  case 1: return data_->dist1_.num_subblocks();
 525  case 2: return data_->dist2_.num_subblocks();
 526  }
 527}

 534inline length_type
 535Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::cyclic_contiguity(dimension_type d)
 536  const VSIP_NOTHROW

 538  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);

 541  {
 542  default: assert(false);

 544  case 1: return data_->dist1_.cyclic_contiguity();
 545  case 2: return data_->dist2_.cyclic_contiguity();
 546  }

 550
 551// Get number of patches in a dimension D's subblock SB.
 552
 553template <typename       Dist0,
 554	  typename       Dist1,
 555	  typename       Dist2>
 556inline length_type
 557Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_subblock_patches(
 558  dimension_type d,
 559  index_type  sb
 560  )
 561  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 562{
 563  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 564
 565  switch (d)
 566  {
 567  default: assert(false);
 568  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_subblock_patches(dom_[0], sb);
 569  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_subblock_patches(dom_[1], sb);
 570  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_subblock_patches(dom_[2], sb);
 571  }
 572}

 592  default: assert(false);
 593  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_subblock_size(dom_[0], sb);
 594  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_subblock_size(dom_[1], sb);
 595  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_subblock_size(dom_[2], sb);
 596  }

 601// Get global domain for a dimension/subblock/patch
 602
 603template <typename       Dist0,
 604	  typename       Dist1,
 605	  typename       Dist2>
 606inline Domain<1>
 607Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_patch_global_dom(
 608  dimension_type d,
 609  index_type  sb,
 610  index_type     p
 611  )
 612  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 613{
 614  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 615
 616  switch (d)
 617  {
 618  default: assert(false);
 619  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_patch_global_dom(dom_[0], sb, p);
 620  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_patch_global_dom(dom_[1], sb, p);
 621  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_patch_global_dom(dom_[2], sb, p);
 622  }
 623}

 652
 653// Get local subblock for a given index.
 654
 655template <typename       Dist0,
 656	  typename       Dist1,
 657	  typename       Dist2>
 658inline index_type
 659Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_dim_subblock_from_index(
 660  dimension_type d,
 661  index_type     idx
 662  )
 663  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 664{
 665  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 666  assert(d < dim_);
 667
 668  switch (d)
 669  {
 670  default: assert(false);
 671  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_subblock_from_index(dom_[0], idx);
 672  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_subblock_from_index(dom_[1], idx);
 673  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_subblock_from_index(dom_[2], idx);
 674  }
 675}

 678
 679// Get local patch for a given index.
 680
 681template <typename       Dist0,
 682	  typename       Dist1,
 683	  typename       Dist2>
 684inline index_type
 685Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_dim_patch_from_index(
 686  dimension_type d,
 687  index_type     idx
 688  )
 689  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 690{
 691  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 692  assert(d < dim_);
 693
 694  switch (d)
 695  {
 696  default: assert(false);
 697  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_patch_from_index(dom_[0], idx);
 698  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_patch_from_index(dom_[1], idx);
 699  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_patch_from_index(dom_[2], idx);
 700  }
 701}

 704
 705template <typename       Dist0,
 706	  typename       Dist1,
 707	  typename       Dist2>
 708inline index_type
 709Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_local_from_global_index(
 710  dimension_type d,
 711  index_type     idx
 712  )
 713  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 714{
 715  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 716  assert(d < dim_);
 717
 718  switch (d)
 719  {
 720  default: assert(false);
 721  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_local_from_global_index(dom_[0], idx);
 722  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_local_from_global_index(dom_[1], idx);
 723  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_local_from_global_index(dom_[2], idx);
 724  }
 725}
 726
 727
 728
 729/// Determine subblock holding a global index.
 730
 731template <typename       Dist0,
 732	  typename       Dist1,
 733	  typename       Dist2>
 734template <dimension_type Dim>
 735inline index_type
 736Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_subblock_from_global_index(
 737  Index<Dim> const& idx
 738  )
 739  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 740{
 741  index_type sb = 0;
 742  assert(dim_ != 0 && dim_ == Dim);
 743
 744  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
 745  {
 746    assert(idx[d] < dom_[d].size());
 747    if (d != 0)
 748      sb *= data_->subblocks_[d];
 749    sb += impl_dim_subblock_from_index(d, idx[d]);
 750  }
 751
 752  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_);
 753  index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
 754  impl::split_tuple(sb, dim_, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
 755  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
 756  {
 757    assert(dim_sb[d] == impl_dim_subblock_from_index(d, idx[d]));
 758  }
 759
 760  return sb;
 761}
 762
 763
 764
 765/// Determine subblock/patch holding a global index.
 766
 767template <typename       Dist0,
 768	  typename       Dist1,
 769	  typename       Dist2>
 770template <dimension_type Dim>
 771inline index_type
 772Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_patch_from_global_index(
 773  Index<Dim> const& idx
 774  )
 775  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 776{
 777  index_type p = 0;
 778  index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
 779
 780  assert(dim_ != 0 && dim_ == Dim);
 781
 782  index_type sb = this->impl_subblock_from_global_index(idx);
 783  impl::split_tuple(sb, dim_, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
 784
 785  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
 786  {
 787    assert(idx[d] < dom_[d].size());
 788    if (d != 0)
 789      p *= impl_subblock_patches(d, dim_sb[d]);
 790    p += impl_dim_patch_from_index(d, idx[d]);
 791  }
 792
 793  assert(p < this->impl_num_patches(sb));
 794  return p;
 795}
 796
 797
 798
 799/// Determine global index from local index for a single dimension
 800
 801/// Requires:
 802///   D to be a dimension for map.
 803///   SB to be a valid subblock for map.
 804///   IDX to be an local index within subblock SB.
 805/// Returns:
 806///   global index corresponding to local index IDX.
 807
 808template <typename       Dist0,
 809	  typename       Dist1,
 810	  typename       Dist2>
 811inline index_type
 812Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_global_from_local_index(
 813  dimension_type d,
 814  index_type     sb,
 815  index_type     idx
 816  )
 817  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 818{
 819  assert(d < VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION);
 820  assert(dim_ != 0 && d < dim_);
 821
 822  index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
 823  impl::split_tuple(sb, dim_, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
 824
 825  switch (d)
 826  {
 827  default: assert(false);
 828  case 0: return data_->dist0_.impl_global_from_local_index(dom_[0], dim_sb[0], idx);
 829  case 1: return data_->dist1_.impl_global_from_local_index(dom_[1], dim_sb[1], idx);
 830  case 2: return data_->dist2_.impl_global_from_local_index(dom_[2], dim_sb[2], idx);
 831  }
 832}
 833
 834
 835
 836template <typename       Dist0,
 837	  typename       Dist1,
 838	  typename       Dist2>
 839template <dimension_type Dim>
 840inline Domain<Dim>
 841Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_local_from_global_domain(
 842  index_type         sb,
 843  Domain<Dim> const& g_dom
 844  )
 845  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 846{
 847  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_);
 848  assert(dim_ == Dim);
 849
 850  if (this->impl_num_patches(sb) != 1)
 851      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(
 852	impl::unimplemented(
 853	  "Map<>::impl_local_from_global_domain: Subviews have a single patch"));
 854
 855  Domain<Dim> sb_g_dom = this->template impl_global_domain<Dim>(sb, 0);
 856  Domain<Dim> sb_l_dom = this->template impl_local_domain<Dim>(sb, 0);
 857  Domain<Dim> intr;
 858
 859  if (impl::intersect(sb_g_dom, g_dom, intr))
 860  {
 861    Domain<Dim> l_dom = impl::apply_intr(sb_l_dom, sb_g_dom, intr);
 862    return l_dom;
 863  }
 864  else
 865    return impl::empty_domain<Dim>();
 866}
 867
 868
 869
 870/// Lookup the index of a processor in the map's processor set.
 871
 872/// Requires:
 873///   PR is a processor in the map's processor set (its' grid function).
 874///
 875/// Effects:
 876///   Returns the index of processor PR in the set.
 877///   If PR is not in the set, an exception is thrown and/or an
 878///      assertion fails.
 879
 880template <typename       Dist0,
 881	  typename       Dist1,
 882	  typename       Dist2>
 883inline index_type
 884Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_rank_from_proc(processor_type pr)
 885  const
 886{
 887  for (index_type i=0; i<data_->pvec_.size(); ++i)
 888    if (data_->pvec_[i] == pr)
 889      return i;
 890
 891  return no_rank;
 892}
 893
 894
 895
 896/// Subblock held by processor
 897
 898/// Requires:
 899///   PR is a processor in the map's processor set.
 900/// Returns:
 901///   The subblock held by processor PR, or NO_SUBBLOCK if there is none.
 902
 903template <typename       Dist0,
 904	  typename       Dist1,
 905	  typename       Dist2>
 906inline
 907index_type
 908Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::subblock(processor_type pr)
 909  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 910{
 911  index_type pi = impl_rank_from_proc(pr);
 912
 913  if (pi != no_rank && pi < data_->num_subblocks_)
 914    return pi;
 915  else
 916    return no_subblock;
 917}
 918
 919
 920
 921/// Subblock held by local processor
 922
 923/// Returns:
 924///   The subblock held by processor PR, or NO_SUBBLOCK if there is none.
 925
 926template <typename       Dist0,
 927	  typename       Dist1,
 928	  typename       Dist2>
 929inline
 930index_type
 931Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::subblock()
 932  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 933{
 934  processor_type pr = local_processor();
 935  index_type     pi = impl_rank_from_proc(pr);
 936
 937  if (pi != no_rank && pi < data_->num_subblocks_)
 938    return pi;
 939  else
 940    return no_subblock;
 941}
 942
 943
 944
 945/// Beginning of range for processors holding a subblock.
 946
 947/// Requires:
 948///   SB is a subblock of the map.
 949///
 950/// Returns:
 951///   A PROCESSOR_ITERATOR referring to the first processor holding
 952///      subblock SB.
 953///
 954/// Notes:
 955///  - For a Map, each subblock is only mapped to one processor.
 956
 957template <typename       Dist0,
 958	  typename       Dist1,
 959	  typename       Dist2>
 960inline
 961typename Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::processor_iterator
 962Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::processor_begin(index_type sb)
 963  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 964{
 965  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_);
 966
 967  return processor_iterator(data_->pvec_[sb % data_->num_procs_], 1);
 968}
 969
 970
 971
 972/// End of range for processors holding a subblock.
 973
 974/// Requires:
 975///   SB is a subblock of the map.
 976///
 977/// Returns:
 978///   A PROCESSOR_ITERATOR referring to the one past the last
 979///      processor holding subblock SB.
 980///
 981/// Notes:
 982///  - For a Map, each subblock is only mapped to one processor.
 983
 984template <typename       Dist0,
 985	  typename       Dist1,
 986	  typename       Dist2>
 987inline
 988typename Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::processor_iterator
 989Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::processor_end(index_type sb)
 990  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 991{
 992  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_);
 993
 994  return processor_iterator(data_->pvec_[sb % data_->num_procs_]+1, 1);
 995}
 996
 997
 998
 999/// Map's processor set.
1000
1001/// Returns:
1002///   A vector containing the map's processor set.
1003
1004template <typename       Dist0,
1005	  typename       Dist1,
1006	  typename       Dist2>
1007inline
1008const_Vector<processor_type>
1009Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::processor_set()
1010  const
1011{
1012  Vector<processor_type> pset(this->data_->num_procs_);
1013
1014  for (index_type i=0; i<this->data_->num_procs_; ++i)
1015    pset.put(i, this->data_->pvec_[i]);
1016
1017  return pset;
1018}
1019
1020
1021
1022/// Get the number of patches in a subblock.
1023
1024/// Requires:
1025///   SB is a valid subblock of THIS, or NO_SUBBLOCK.
1026
1027template <typename       Dist0,
1028	  typename       Dist1,
1029	  typename       Dist2>
1030inline
1031length_type
1032Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_num_patches(index_type sb)
1033  const VSIP_NOTHROW
1034{
1035  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_ || sb == no_subblock);
1036  assert(dim_ != 0);
1037
1038  if (sb == no_subblock)
1039    return 0;
1040  else
1041  {
1042    index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1043
1044    impl::split_tuple(sb, dim_, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
1045
1046    length_type patches = 1;
1047    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim_; ++d)
1048      patches *= impl_subblock_patches(d, dim_sb[d]);
1049
1050    return patches;
1051  }
1052}
1053
1054
1055
1056/// Get the size of a subblock (represented by a domain).
1057
1058/// Requires:
1059///   SB is a valid subblock of THIS, or NO_SUBBLOCK.
1060
1061template <typename       Dist0,
1062	  typename       Dist1,
1063	  typename       Dist2>
1064template <dimension_type Dim>
1065inline
1066Domain<Dim>
1067Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_subblock_domain(index_type sb)
1068  const VSIP_NOTHROW
1069{
1070  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_ || sb == no_subblock);
1071  assert(dim_ == Dim);
1072
1073  if (sb == no_subblock)
1074    return impl::empty_domain<Dim>();
1075  else
1076  {
1077    index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1078    Domain<1>  dom[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1079
1080    impl::split_tuple(sb, dim_, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
1081
1082    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim_; ++d)
1083      dom[d] = Domain<1>(impl_subblock_size(d, dim_sb[d]));
1084
1085    return impl::construct_domain<Dim>(dom);
1086  }
1087}
1088
1089
1090
1091/// Get the size of a subblock (represented by a domain).
1092
1093/// Requires:
1094///   SB is a valid subblock of THIS, or NO_SUBBLOCK.
1095
1096template <typename       Dist0,
1097	  typename       Dist1,
1098	  typename       Dist2>
1099template <dimension_type Dim>
1100inline
1101impl::Length<Dim>
1102Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_subblock_extent(index_type sb)
1103  const VSIP_NOTHROW
1104{
1105  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_ || sb == no_subblock);
1106  assert(dim_ == Dim);
1107
1108  impl::Length<Dim> size;
1109
1110  if (sb == no_subblock)
1111  {
1112    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim_; ++d)
1113      size[d] = 0;
1114  }
1115  else
1116  {
1117    index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1118
1119    impl::split_tuple(sb, dim_, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
1120
1121    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim_; ++d)
1122      size[d] = impl_subblock_size(d, dim_sb[d]);
1123  }
1124
1125  return size;
1126}
1127
1128
1129
1130/// Return the global domain of a subblock's patch.
1131
1132/// Requires:
1133///   SB to be a valid subblock of Map,
1134///   P to be a valid patch of subblock SB.
1135
1136template <typename       Dist0,
1137	  typename       Dist1,
1138	  typename       Dist2>
1139template <dimension_type Dim>
1140inline
1141Domain<Dim>
1142Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_global_domain(
1143  index_type    sb,
1144  index_type    p)
1145const VSIP_NOTHROW
1146{
1147  index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1148  index_type p_size[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1149  index_type dim_p[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1150  Domain<1>  dom[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1151
1152  // Handle special-case of no_subblock before checking validity of
1153  // other arguments.
1154  if (sb == no_subblock)
1155  {
1156    for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1157      dom[d] = Domain<1>(0);
1158    return impl::construct_domain<Dim>(dom);
1159  }
1160
1161  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_);
1162  assert(p  < this->impl_num_patches(sb));
1163  assert(dim_ == Dim);
1164
1165  impl::split_tuple(sb, Dim, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
1166
1167  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1168    p_size[d] = impl_subblock_patches(d, dim_sb[d]);
1169
1170  impl::split_tuple(p, Dim, p_size, dim_p);
1171
1172  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1173    dom[d] = impl_patch_global_dom(d, dim_sb[d], dim_p[d]);
1174
1175  return impl::construct_domain<Dim>(dom);
1176}
1177
1178
1179
1180/// Return the local domain of a subblock's patch.
1181
1182/// Requires:
1183///   SB to be a valid subblock of Map,
1184///   P to be a valid patch of subblock SB.
1185
1186template <typename       Dist0,
1187	  typename       Dist1,
1188	  typename       Dist2>
1189template <dimension_type Dim>
1190inline
1191Domain<Dim>
1192Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::impl_local_domain(
1193  index_type    sb,
1194  index_type    p
1195  )
1196  const VSIP_NOTHROW
1197{
1198  index_type dim_sb[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1199  index_type p_size[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1200  index_type dim_p[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1201  Domain<1>  dom[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1202
1203  // Handle special-case of no_subblock before checking validity of
1204  // other arguments.
1205  if (sb == no_subblock)
1206  {
1207    for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1208      dom[d] = Domain<1>(0);
1209    return impl::construct_domain<Dim>(dom);
1210  }
1211
1212  assert(sb < data_->num_subblocks_);
1213  assert(p  < this->impl_num_patches(sb));
1214  assert(dim_ == Dim);
1215
1216
1217  impl::split_tuple(sb, Dim, data_->subblocks_, dim_sb);
1218
1219  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1220    p_size[d] = impl_subblock_patches(d, dim_sb[d]);
1221
1222  impl::split_tuple(p, Dim, p_size, dim_p);
1223
1224  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1225    dom[d] = impl_patch_local_dom(d, dim_sb[d], dim_p[d]);
1226
1227  return impl::construct_domain<Dim>(dom);
1228}
1229
1230
1231
1232/// Return the applied domain of a map
1233
1234/// Requires:
1235
1236template <typename       Dist0,
1237	  typename       Dist1,
1238	  typename       Dist2>
1239template <dimension_type Dim>
1240inline
1241Domain<Dim>
1242Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>::applied_domain()
1243  const VSIP_NOTHROW
1244{
1245  assert(dim_ == Dim);
1246
1247  Domain<1>  dom[VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION];
1248
1249  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1250    dom[d] = this->dom_[d];
1251
1252  return impl::construct_domain<Dim>(dom);
1253}
1254
1255
1256
1257template <typename Dim0,
1258	  typename Dim1,
1259	  typename Dim2>
1260bool
1261operator==(Map<Dim0, Dim1, Dim2> const& map1,
1262	   Map<Dim0, Dim1, Dim2> const& map2) VSIP_NOTHROW
1263{
1264  for (dimension_type d=0; d<VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION; ++d)
1265  {
1266    if (map1.distribution(d)      != map2.distribution(d) ||
1267	map1.num_subblocks(d)     != map2.num_subblocks(d) ||
1268	map1.cyclic_contiguity(d) != map2.cyclic_contiguity(d))
1269      return false;
1270  }
1271
1272  if (map1.data_->comm_ != map2.data_->comm_)
1273    return false;
1274
1275  if (map1.data_->pvec_.size() != map2.data_->pvec_.size())
1276    return false;
1277
1278  for (index_type i=0; i<map1.data_->pvec_.size(); ++i)
1279    if (map1.data_->pvec_[i] != map2.data_->pvec_[i])
1280      return false;
1281
1282  return true;
1283}
1284
1285
1286
1287template <dimension_type Dim,
1288	  typename       Dist0,
1289	  typename       Dist1,
1290	  typename       Dist2>
1291bool
1292map_equiv(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map1,
1293	  Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map2) VSIP_NOTHROW
1294{
1295  if (Dim == 1 &&
1296         (map1.data_->dist0_.num_subblocks()     !=
1297          map2.data_->dist0_.num_subblocks()
1298       || map1.data_->dist0_.cyclic_contiguity() !=
1299          map2.data_->dist0_.cyclic_contiguity()))
1300    return false;
1301  else if (Dim == 2 &&
1302         (map1.data_->dist0_.num_subblocks()     !=
1303          map2.data_->dist0_.num_subblocks()
1304       || map1.data_->dist0_.cyclic_contiguity() !=
1305          map2.data_->dist0_.cyclic_contiguity()
1306       || map1.data_->dist1_.num_subblocks()     !=
1307          map2.data_->dist1_.num_subblocks()
1308       || map1.data_->dist1_.cyclic_contiguity() !=
1309          map2.data_->dist1_.cyclic_contiguity()))
1310    return false;
1311  else if (Dim == 3 &&
1312      (   map1.data_->dist0_.num_subblocks()     !=
1313          map2.data_->dist0_.num_subblocks()
1314       || map1.data_->dist0_.cyclic_contiguity() !=
1315          map2.data_->dist0_.cyclic_contiguity()
1316       || map1.data_->dist1_.num_subblocks()     !=
1317          map2.data_->dist1_.num_subblocks()
1318       || map1.data_->dist1_.cyclic_contiguity() !=
1319          map2.data_->dist1_.cyclic_contiguity()
1320       || map1.data_->dist2_.num_subblocks()     !=
1321          map2.data_->dist2_.num_subblocks()
1322       || map1.data_->dist2_.cyclic_contiguity() !=
1323          map2.data_->dist2_.cyclic_contiguity()))
1324    return false;
1325
1326
1327  // implied by checks on distX_.num_subblocks()
1328  assert(map1.num_subblocks() == map1.num_subblocks());
1329
1330  if (map1.data_->comm_ != map2.data_->comm_)
1331    return false;
1332
1333  assert(map1.data_->pvec_.size() >= map1.num_subblocks());
1334  assert(map2.data_->pvec_.size() >= map2.num_subblocks());
1335
1336  for (index_type i=0; i<map1.num_subblocks(); ++i)
1337    if (map1.data_->pvec_[i] != map2.data_->pvec_[i])
1338      return false;
1339
1340  return true;
1341}
1342
1343
1344
1345template <typename DimA0,
1346	  typename DimA1,
1347	  typename DimA2,
1348	  typename DimB0,
1349	  typename DimB1,
1350	  typename DimB2>
1351bool
1352operator==(Map<DimA0, DimA1, DimA2> const&,
1353	   Map<DimB0, DimB1, DimB2> const&) VSIP_NOTHROW
1354{
1355  return false;
1356}
1357
1358
1359
1360namespace impl
1361{
1362
1363template <typename Dist0,
1364	  typename Dist1,
1365	  typename Dist2>
1366struct Is_global_map<Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1367{ static bool const value = true; };
1368
1369template <dimension_type Dim,
1370          typename       Map>
1371struct Select_dist;
1372
1373template <typename Dist0,
1374	  typename Dist1,
1375	  typename Dist2>
1376struct Select_dist<0, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1377{ typedef Dist0 type; };
1378
1379template <typename Dist0,
1380	  typename Dist1,
1381	  typename Dist2>
1382struct Select_dist<1, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1383{ typedef Dist1 type; };
1384
1385template <typename Dist0,
1386	  typename Dist1,
1387	  typename Dist2>
1388struct Select_dist<2, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1389{ typedef Dist2 type; };
1390
1391template <dimension_type Dim,
1392	  typename       Dist0,
1393	  typename       Dist1,
1394	  typename       Dist2>
1395struct Is_block_dist<Dim, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1396{
1397private:
1398  typedef typename Select_dist<Dim, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >::type dist_type;
1399public:
1400  static bool const value = Type_equal<dist_type, Block_dist>::value ||
1401                            Type_equal<dist_type, Whole_dist>::value;
1402};
1403
1404
1405template <dimension_type Dim,
1406	  typename       Dist0,
1407	  typename       Dist1,
1408	  typename       Dist2>
1409struct Map_equal<Dim, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2>, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1410{
1411  static bool value(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map1,
1412		    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map2)
1413  { return (map1.data_.get() == map2.data_.get()) ||
1414           map_equiv<Dim>(map1, map2); }
1415};
1416
1417
1418
1419/***********************************************************************
1420  Clone a distribution.
1421***********************************************************************/
1422
1423template <typename DistT, typename MapT> struct Dist_factory;
1424
1425template <typename MapT>
1426struct Dist_factory<Whole_dist, MapT>
1427{
1428  static Whole_dist copy(MapT const&, dimension_type)
1429  { return Whole_dist(); }
1430};
1431
1432template <typename MapT>
1433struct Dist_factory<Block_dist, MapT>
1434{
1435  static Block_dist copy(MapT const& map, dimension_type dim)
1436  { return Block_dist(map.num_subblocks(dim));}
1437};
1438
1439template <typename MapT>
1440struct Dist_factory<Cyclic_dist, MapT>
1441{
1442  static Cyclic_dist copy(MapT const& map, dimension_type dim)
1443  {
1444    return Cyclic_dist(map.num_subblocks(dim),
1445		       map.cyclic_contiguity(dim));
1446  }
1447};
1448
1449template <typename DistT, typename MapT>
1450DistT copy_dist(MapT const& map, dimension_type dim)
1451{
1452  return Dist_factory<DistT, MapT>::copy(map, dim);
1453}
1454
1455
1456
1457/***********************************************************************
1458  Project a Map, removing 1 dimension.
1459***********************************************************************/
1460
1461template <typename       Dist0,
1462	  typename       Dist1,
1463	  typename       Dist2>
1464struct Map_project_1<0, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1465{
1466  typedef Map<Dist1, Dist2> type;
1467
1468  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1469  static index_type parent_subblock(
1470    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1471    index_type                      idx,
1472    index_type                      sb)
1473  {
1474    // length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1475    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1476    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1477
1478    index_type fix_sb_0 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(0, idx);
1479
1480    return fix_sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2+ sb;
1481  }
1482
1483  static type project(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map, index_type idx)
1484  {
1485    // length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1486    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1487    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1488
1489    index_type fix_sb_0 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(0, idx);
1490
1491    Vector<processor_type> pvec(num_sb_1*num_sb_2);
1492
1493    for (index_type pi=0; pi<num_sb_1*num_sb_2; ++pi)
1494      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(fix_sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2+pi);
1495
1496    return type(pvec, copy_dist<Dist1>(map, 1), copy_dist<Dist2>(map, 2));
1497  }
1498};
1499
1500
1501
1502template <typename       Dist0,
1503	  typename       Dist1,
1504	  typename       Dist2>
1505struct Map_project_1<1, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1506{
1507  typedef Map<Dist0, Dist2> type;
1508
1509  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1510  static index_type parent_subblock(
1511    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1512    index_type                      idx,
1513    index_type                      sb)
1514  {
1515    length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1516    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1517    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1518
1519    index_type fix_sb_1 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(1, idx);
1520
1521    index_type sb_0 = sb / num_sb_2;
1522    index_type sb_2 = sb % num_sb_2;
1523
1524    return sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_1*num_sb_2      + sb_2;
1525  }
1526
1527  static type project(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map, index_type idx)
1528  {
1529    length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1530    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1531    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1532
1533    index_type fix_sb_1 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(1, idx);
1534
1535    Vector<processor_type> pvec(num_sb_0*num_sb_2);
1536
1537    for (index_type pi=0; pi<num_sb_0*num_sb_2; ++pi)
1538    {
1539      index_type sb_0 = pi / num_sb_2;
1540      index_type sb_2 = pi % num_sb_2;
1541      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 +
1542					 fix_sb_1*num_sb_2      + sb_2);
1543    }
1544
1545    return type(pvec, copy_dist<Dist1>(map, 0), copy_dist<Dist2>(map, 2));
1546  }
1547};
1548
1549
1550
1551template <typename       Dist0,
1552	  typename       Dist1,
1553	  typename       Dist2>
1554struct Map_project_1<2, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1555{
1556  typedef Map<Dist0, Dist1> type;
1557
1558  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1559  static index_type parent_subblock(
1560    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1561    index_type                      idx,
1562    index_type                      sb)
1563  {
1564    length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1565    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1566    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1567
1568    index_type fix_sb_2 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(2, idx);
1569
1570    index_type sb_0 = sb / num_sb_1;
1571    index_type sb_1 = sb % num_sb_1;
1572    return sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 + sb_1*num_sb_2          + fix_sb_2;
1573  }
1574
1575  static type project(Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map, index_type idx)
1576  {
1577    length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1578    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1579    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1580
1581    index_type fix_sb_2 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(2, idx);
1582
1583    Vector<processor_type> pvec(num_sb_0*num_sb_1);
1584
1585    for (index_type pi=0; pi<num_sb_0*num_sb_1; ++pi)
1586    {
1587      index_type sb_0 = pi / num_sb_1;
1588      index_type sb_1 = pi % num_sb_1;
1589      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 +
1590					 sb_1*num_sb_2          +
1591					 fix_sb_2);
1592    }
1593
1594    return type(pvec, copy_dist<Dist1>(map, 0), copy_dist<Dist2>(map, 1));
1595  }
1596};

1600/***********************************************************************
1601  Project a Map, removing 2 dimensions.
1602***********************************************************************/
1603
1604template <typename       Dist0,
1605	  typename       Dist1,
1606	  typename       Dist2>
1607struct Map_project_2<0, 1, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1608{
1609  typedef Map<Dist2> type;
1610
1611  static type project(
1612    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1613    index_type                      idx0,
1614    index_type                      idx1)
1615  {
1616    // length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1617    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1618    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1619
1620    index_type fix_sb_0 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(0, idx0);
1621    index_type fix_sb_1 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(1, idx1);
1622
1623    Vector<processor_type> pvec(num_sb_2);
1624
1625    for (index_type pi=0; pi<num_sb_2; ++pi)
1626      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(fix_sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 +
1627					 fix_sb_1*num_sb_2 + pi);
1628
1629    return type(pvec, copy_dist<Dist2>(map, 2));
1630  }
1631
1632  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1633  static index_type parent_subblock(
1634    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1635    index_type                      idx0,
1636    index_type                      idx1,
1637    index_type                      sb)
1638  {
1639    // length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1640    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1641    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1642
1643    index_type fix_sb_0 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(0, idx0);
1644    index_type fix_sb_1 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(1, idx1);
1645
1646    return fix_sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_1*num_sb_2 + sb;
1647  }
1648};
1649
1650template <typename       Dist0,
1651	  typename       Dist1,
1652	  typename       Dist2>
1653struct Map_project_2<0, 2, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1654{
1655  typedef Map<Dist2> type;
1656
1657  static type project(
1658    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1659    index_type                      idx0,
1660    index_type                      idx2)
1661  {
1662    // length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1663    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1664    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1665
1666    index_type fix_sb_0 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(0, idx0);
1667    index_type fix_sb_2 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(2, idx2);
1668
1669    Vector<processor_type> pvec(num_sb_1);
1670
1671    for (index_type pi=0; pi<num_sb_1; ++pi)
1672      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(fix_sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 +
1673					 pi*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_2);
1674
1675    return type(pvec, copy_dist<Dist1>(map, 1));
1676  }
1677
1678  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1679  static index_type parent_subblock(
1680    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1681    index_type                      idx0,
1682    index_type                      idx2,
1683    index_type                      sb)
1684  {
1685    // length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1686    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1687    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1688
1689    index_type fix_sb_0 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(0, idx0);
1690    index_type fix_sb_2 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(2, idx2);
1691
1692    return fix_sb_0*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 + sb*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_2;
1693  }
1694};
1695
1696template <typename       Dist0,
1697	  typename       Dist1,
1698	  typename       Dist2>
1699struct Map_project_2<1, 2, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1700{
1701  typedef Map<Dist2> type;
1702
1703  static type project(
1704    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1705    index_type                      idx1,
1706    index_type                      idx2)
1707  {
1708    length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1709    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1710    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1711
1712    index_type fix_sb_1 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(1, idx1);
1713    index_type fix_sb_2 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(2, idx2);
1714
1715    Vector<processor_type> pvec(num_sb_0);
1716
1717    for (index_type pi=0; pi<num_sb_0; ++pi)
1718      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(pi*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 +
1719					 fix_sb_1*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_2);
1720
1721    return type(pvec, copy_dist<Dist0>(map, 0));
1722  }
1723
1724  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1725  static index_type parent_subblock(
1726    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1727    index_type                      idx1,
1728    index_type                      idx2,
1729    index_type                      sb)
1730  {
1731    length_type num_sb_0 = map.num_subblocks(0);
1732    length_type num_sb_1 = map.num_subblocks(1);
1733    length_type num_sb_2 = map.num_subblocks(2);
1734
1735    index_type fix_sb_1 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(1, idx1);
1736    index_type fix_sb_2 = map.impl_dim_subblock_from_index(2, idx2);
1737
1738    return sb*num_sb_1*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_1*num_sb_2 + fix_sb_2;
1739  }
1740};

1744/***********************************************************************
1745  Map subdomain
1746***********************************************************************/
1747
1748#if 0
1749// This functionality is now provided by Subset_map.  Remove after
1750// performance is characterized.
1751template <dimension_type Dim,
1752	  typename       Dist0,
1753	  typename       Dist1,
1754	  typename       Dist2>
1755struct Map_subdomain<Dim, Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> >
1756{
1757  typedef Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> type;
1758
1759  static type project(
1760    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1761    Domain<Dim> const&              dom)
1762  {
1763    // Check each dimension
1764    for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
1765    {
1766      if (map.num_subblocks(d) == 1)
1767	; /* OK */
1768      // TODO: Handle single index
1769      else
1770      {
1771	// If this dimension is distributed, then subdomain must be full
1772	if (dom[d].first() != 0 || dom[d].stride() != 1 ||
1773	    dom[d].size() != map.template applied_domain<Dim>()[d].size())
1774	{
1775	  VSIP_IMPL_THROW(
1776	    impl::unimplemented(
1777	      "Map_subdomain: Subviews must not break up distributed dimensions"));
1778	}
1779      }
1780    }
1781
1782    Vector<processor_type> pvec(map.num_subblocks());
1783
1784    for (index_type pi=0; pi<map.num_subblocks(); ++pi)
1785      pvec(pi) = map.impl_proc_from_rank(pi);
1786	
1787    return type(pvec,
1788		copy_dist<Dist0>(map, 0),
1789		copy_dist<Dist1>(map, 1),
1790		copy_dist<Dist2>(map, 2));
1791  }
1792
1793  // Return the parent subblock corresponding to a child subblock.
1794  static index_type parent_subblock(
1795    Map<Dist0, Dist1, Dist2> const& map,
1796    Domain<Dim> const&              /*dom*/,
1797    index_type                      sb)
1798  {
1799    return sb;
1800  }
1801};
1802#endif
